  Analysis of Cheese data from TidyTuesday
author: Jack Susank
date: February 15, 2025
format: html
echo: FALSE
---

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2024, week = 23)

cheeses <- tuesdata$cheeses
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(cheeses, aes(x = fat_content, y = calcium_content)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    caption = "Source: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/main/data/2024/2024-06-04/readme.md
    
https://www.cheese.com/alphabetical/
"
  )
```
